channel.title: Projects on Ethan JOAO
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ethan JOAO

item.title: Web Marathon
item.description:
This is a school project made in November 2022 during my three-year university degree in IT. It is a group project in collaboration with some students from another three-year university degree.
This project consists of a numeric art gallery website, which contained rooms and differents works per room.

item.title: Fractals generator library
item.description: This is a school project made in October 2022 during my three-year university degree in IT. It consists of the creation of a Java library that generate fractals.

item.title: Zelda-like video game
item.description: This is an ongoing personal project which consists of the creation of a JavaFX video game inspired by the first The Legend of Zelda game.

item.title: Geode Project
item.description: This is an ongoing personal project which consists in the creation of a database in order to organize gemstones collections.
